title: Magnetically nanorized seaweed residue for the adsorption of methylene blue in aqueous solutions
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,23606-23620
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04416A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Xinyi Yang, Jingjing Liu, Xuejin Huang, Hemin Cui, Ligang Wei, Guolin Shao, Xu Fu, Na Liu, Qingda An, Shangru Zhai
Carboxylated nanorized-seaweed residue (NSR) produce via OA–water pretreatments. A magnetic NSR–Fe3O4 nanocomposite was synthesized by electrostatic interaction-induced aggregation for dye adsorption.
